name: Arex: Contain And Keep
description:
Arex: Contain And Keep

This game was made within 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46: Keep It Alive.

Welcome to Arex! At our facilities we keep and contain subjects that are better kept at a safe distance from our cities. In our modern labs we conduct experiments on these subjects in the name of science to find out more about their behaviour and characteristics. 

As a researcher you will perform experiments on our newest subject. Its behaviour is not yet known, so it will take some trial and error to find out more about it. However, we have full confidence that you will figure it out! Oh, by the way... make sure the subject stays alive!

The game features:

  • Humerous and detailed animations
  • Unique puzzles
  • Lots of pixel-art
  • Lots of surprise

Have fun playing!
